<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bloodline Perfection](/Feats.aspx?ID=631) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 201 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[bloodline paragon](/Classes.aspx?ID=11)

</column>

---

You command the ultimate powers of your bloodline and tradition. You gain an additional 10th-level spell slot.
name: Bloodline Perfection
